Package com.markvarga21.studentmanager.exception.handler

Class ApplicationExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.markvarga21.studentmanager.exception.handler.ApplicationExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice @Generated public class ApplicationExceptionHandler extends Object
A custom exception handler for dealing with certain exceptions in the applications.
